verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> on <S%H5058>Neginoth<s%>, <S%H4905>Maschil<s%>, A Psalm of <S%H1732>David<s%>, when the <S%H2130>Ziphims<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, Doth not <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> himself with us? <S%H3467>Save<s%> me, O <S%H430>God<s%>, by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H1777>judge<s%> me by thy <S%H1369>strength<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; give <S%H238>ear<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

For <S%H2114>strangers<s%> are risen <S%H6965>up<s%> against me, and <S%H6184>oppressors<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%>: they have not <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> before them. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
Behold, <S%H430>God<s%> is mine <S%H5826>helper<s%>: the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is with them that <S%H5564>uphold<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
He shall <S%H7725%H7725>reward<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> unto mine <S%H8324>enemies<s%>: cut them <S%H6789>off<s%> in thy <S%H571>truth<s%>.
I will <S%H5071>freely<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto thee: I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for it is <S%H2896>good<s%>.
For he hath <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me out of all <S%H6869>trouble<s%>: and mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> his desire upon mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
